```{r}
library(chenimbalance)
FDR.thresh <- 0.05
p <- 0.5
cACGT <- data.frame(cA = accb$cA, cC = accb$cC, cG = accb$cG, cT = accb$cT)
lower <- apply(cACGT, 1, function(x) sort(x, partial = 3)[3])
higher <- apply(cACGT, 1, max)
total <- higher + lower
b <- 0.01855469
p.bin = apply(
  data.frame(2 * mapply(pbinom, lower, total, p)),
  1,
  function(x) min(x, 1)
)
head(p.bin)
```
